title: CSKHPKV Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 14 Field Assistant and Other Posts
description: The Chaudhary Sarwan Kumar Himachal Pradesh Krishi Vishvavidyalaya (CSKHPKV) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14 Field Assistant, Technical Assistant, Clerk, Pharmacist, and Lab Attendant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, 12th, B.Sc, and D. Pharm can apply for the CSKHPKV Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can ...
